results.title: Effects of simvastatin on hepatic cholesterol metabolism, bile lithogenicity and bile acid hydrophobicity in patients with gallstones.
results.text_hl: METHODS: Thirty-one @<m>DISEASE_Gallstones</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D042882 @@@gallstone@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ were enrolled in the study; 17 were treated with 20 mg @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ daily for 3 weeks prior to cholecystectomy and 14 served as controls.

citations.NLM: Smith JL, Roach PD, Wittenberg LN, Riottot M, Pillay SP, Nestel PJ, Nathanson LK. Effects of simvastatin on hepatic cholesterol metabolism, bile lithogenicity and bile acid hydrophobicity in patients with gallstones. J Gastroenterol Hepatol. 2000 Aug;15(8):871-9. PMID: 11022827
